HiWas doing some reading on cpf shielding..Can I check what happen if the RA is maxed at ERS  are we able to transfer OA to SA then?
Once 55 you cannot transfer OA to SA. CPF shielding is done before RA is formed.
So mainly after yr55 what goes to OA will be there till retirement? RA can be only top up by SA account?
You can transfer OA/SA to RA if you haven't hit ERS. Or you can withdraw the monies if you hit FRS.
Meant that if reach 55  ur SA will top up RA to FRS only and then u can choose OA/SA to top to ERS?If this case  cpf shielding is not impt unless OA got alot of money
anyone with hsbc revo card ? when does the bonus point get credited ?
Once you transfer to RA  it can only be used for CPF Life. Some people want to keep monies in SA to earn 4.08% p.a. interest and withdraw the monies like an ATM.

Hi guys  for those that use the UOB one credit card - can I ask where does the min 3.33% cashback get credited to? As I don‚Äôt see it in my credit card statements as opposed to other UOB cashback credit cards.

Back to the credit card  but need to wait for the quarter to finish
For eg if your 3 month quarter is jan feb mar  the rebate will be in apr statement
Assuming you hit $500 ofeligiblespending for 3 consecutive months (Oct to Dec)  the cashback is automatically credited to the card end Dec.

Ok.For RA to be ERS  should it be done earlier rather compared reach age 65 then max? Whether will impact the monthly payout?
Yes you'll see it +$50 (or more)
Up to you.. they will payout based on how much you have at that point of time. So even if you top-up RA after 65  you will get more payouts.RA is 4.08% p.a. so the interest is pretty good.
